changelog_text:
**What's New in v1.8.0:**

**New Features:**
• Open user profile directly from join request list
• Added search filters
• Added custom message-receive sound
• Added pinned reactions
• Added 'Hide Caption' mode in forward options
• Disabled link preview by default
• Use old bottom forward/shareAlert sheet for all forwards
• Unified username display behavior across all chat types
• Edit file name before sending
• Fully refactored localization download UI/UX
• Hot reload after plugin update (No restart required)
• Memory alert now requires explicit button press (Restart / Dump / Cancel)

**Bug Fixes:**
• Corrected grouped-message expansion logic when using No Quote forward
• Adjusted title & subtext padding to prevent overlap with music speed button
• Fixed 'Summarize Chat' not detecting anonymous admin names
• Fixed click listener for all audio-player menu items
• Show bulletin when forwarding to multiple chats using NoQuote forward from message context menu
